plot outline: Razia is a college student. She is one of the college toppers and the University rank holder. Razia is about to complete her college life and she wants to fulfill the biggest wish of hers before her college life ends and it is nothing but reciting Azaan, the Islamic prayer. Was she able to fulfill her wish? Who all pulled her down?
title: Vaanku
plot: Razia, who belongs from a conservative town of Kerala, lives happily with her family. During her final year semester, Razia and her friends discuss their desires where she unveils her one wish to fulfill before the end of her student life.

Razia is a college student. She is one of the college toppers and the University rank holder. Razia is about to complete her college life and she wants to fulfill the biggest wish of hers before her college life ends and it is nothing but reciting Azaan, the Islamic prayer. Was she able to fulfill her wish? Who all pulled her down?
